Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Reroute near Washington/LaSalle
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near Washington/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near Washington/LaSalle.

Southbound buses will operate via Washington, LaSalle, Adams, Clinton, Harris and  Balbo then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Balbo, Michigan, Harrison, Randolph and Washington then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Loop 'L' Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green and Loop 'L' Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green and Loop 'L' Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
